name: Down Under
description:
Explore the coral reef and test your quick clicking skills to try and survive. Become any of the 54 fish of the coral reef and try to survive the fish eat fish world you find yourself in. Stay healthy by finding cleaner fish and keep your belly full by eating your preferred meals, and above all else don't get eaten by the bigger fish.

Get a taste of what it was like in 1996 sitting at a brand new Windows 95 desktop in the middle school computer lab and starting up a video game that you might actually learn something from. While I can't guarantee you will learn something from Down Under I can say you will enjoy your time as a fish all the way from a small Silver Sprat to the Great White Shark.

4 Game Modes

Gauntlet - Become each fish in turn from smallest to largest and survive each one. Can you do it?
Challenge - Four fish randomly selected can you survive?
Create a Fish - Make your own colorful fish and see how long you last.
Practice - Choose whichever fish you want to become and explore the reef. Watch out for predators.
